entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @thehill 🤔 He doesn't stick to the facts. Don't nobody want to keep hearing Trump tell lies & go on & on talking about nothing that has to do with the Coronavirus. He needs to stop talking so damn much, let the REAL MEDICAL EXPERTS talk, & get the states the help the actually need. https://t.co/pMgej4XWNI
